query: dialog with R's persona: persona: i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water. i am a recluse. i'm a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. context:  Q: hello , how are you ? where abouts are you ? R: <extra_id_0>
answers: i'm in chicago . where are you ?
generation: i am in cali, what about you?

passages.title: Samantha is Self-Sufficient
passages.text: My dad always taught me how to be self-sufficient. I even taught myself how to change a tyre on a car. One day my tyre blew while I was driving. I was able to properly change my tyre. I was very grateful to be able to get home safely.

passages.title: Flat Tire
passages.text: I was driving to work one day. All of a sudden, I heard my tire pop. When I pulled over, I found that I had a flat tire. I had to call AAA to get my tire fixed. Unfortunately, I ended up being late for work.

passages.title: Someday I'll come Home
passages.text: I left my son and girlfriend late in the fall of 1978. After I made it to the other side of the country, I went to the beach. I sat on the shore and drank what was left of my flask. Every year on his birthday, I return to that beach and get drunk. Through tears I tell the ocean that someday I will come home.

passages.title: Francisco's Flight
passages.text: I hadn't seen my mother for years. I saved up money diligently for the flight to my home in Iowa. Finally the day had come for me to fly to Iowa. I and my mother were very happy to see each other. I promised I would never wait so long to see my again.

passages.title: Puppies
passages.text: I loved dogs. My family decided to get a puppy. I was so much work. I didn't know it would be that hard. I decided to get rid of the puppy.

passages.title: Booking ticket in advance
passages.text: I really wanted to go to New York City. My friend Rita lived there so I decided to invite herself. Rita was a little put off but was okay with it. Then to my surprise I told my that I had booked a ticket. I never consulted Rita in advance and I was angry.
